name: Jack Kaliver
title: Fine leathers, real wood, and genuine metal parts cover every square inch of the cabin, and those relegated to the rear seat can relax

title: lagship Phantom sedan glides into 2022 with few changes, but a new option called the Privacy Suite is now available

title: It's a library-quiet, sensory-deprivation cocoon that makes you feel like part of the royal family.

title: The infotainment system is similar to what you'll find in other Mazdas, with a control knob on the center console

title: The latter adds a carbon-fiber roof, hood bulge, and larger rear spoiler.

name: Nuoton kals
title: The cabin—especially that of the extended wheelbase model—is exceptionally spacious and extraordinarily comfortable
